column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I was here a few months after it opened on a date. We could barely get reservations
column2: and when we did we were sent downstairs. It had a different ambiance than the 20's themed music and lounge on the main floor
column3: but it still fit the restaurant. Our server was great and gave many recommendations on what to try. The food was good
column4: albeit pricey. I would definitely recommend this place for that intimate date you were planning for.
